read the Wikipedia definition of
cyberstalking and cyber stalking is the
use of the internet or other electronic
means to stalk or harass an individual a
group or an organization it may include
false accusations check defamation check
slander check libel it may also include
monitoring check identity theft I hope
not but that's being investigated
threats check vandalism possibly
solicitation for sex not so far or
gathering information that may be used
to threaten embarrass or harass check
and the proof of that for anyone wanting
to know is the very fact that that
Pinterest board exists the multiple
Pinterest boards exist the multiple
postings on my channel the whole channel
cluster be free zone and emails and
private messages through any means and
any email addresses cyber stalking is
often accompanied by real-time or
offline stocking both are criminal
offenses both are motivated by a desire
to control intimidate or influence a
victim a stalker may be an online
stranger or person whom the target knows
he may be anonymous and solicit
involvement of other people online who
do not even know the target cyber
stalking is a criminal offense variate
under various anti-stalking slander and
harassment laws a conviction can result
in a restraining order probation or
criminal penalties against the assailant
including jail stalking is a continuous
process consisting of a series of
actions each of which may be entirely
legal in itself cyber stalking is a
technologically based attack on one
person who has been targeted
specifically for that attack for reasons
of anger revenger control cyber stalking
can take many forms including one
harassment embarrassment and humiliation
of the victim to emptying bank accounts
or other economic control such as
ruining the victims credit score three
harassing family friends and employers
to isolate the victim for scare tactics
to instill fear and more cyber angels
has written about how to identify cyber
stalking quote when identifying cyber
stalking in the field and particularly
when considering whether to report it to
any kind of legal authority the
following features or combination of
features can be considered to
characterize a true stocking situation
malice premeditation repetition distress
obsession vendetta no legitimate purpose
personally directed disregarded warnings
to stop harassment and threats a number
of key factors have been identified in
cyber stalking and it says here this
list is incomplete false accusations
many cyber stalkers try to damage the
reputation of their victim and turn
other people against them they post
false information about them on websites
they may set up their own websites blogs
or user pages for this purpose they post
allegations about the victim to
newsgroups chat rooms or other sites
that allow public contributions attempts
to gather information about the victim
cyber stalkers may approach their
victims friends family and work
colleagues to obtain personal
information they may advertise for
information on the internet or hire a
private detective monitoring their
targets online activities and attempting
to trace their IP addresses in an effort
to gather more information about their
victims encouraging others to harass the
victim many cyber stalkers try to
involve third parties in the harassment
they may claim the victim has harmed the
stalker or his family in some way or may
post the victim's name and telephone
number in order to encourage others to
join pursuit false victimization the
cyber stalker will claim that the victim
is harassing him or her bostich writes
that this phenomena has been noted in a
number of well-known cases because they
may give people ideas and finally the
posting of defamatory or derogatory
statements using web pages and message
boards to incite some response or
reaction from their victim it's a long
Wikipedia entry but I think that covers
a lot of it they do go into by anonymous
online mobs web two point O technologies
have enabled online groups of anonymous
people to self-organize to target
individuals with online defamation
threats of violence and technology-based
attacks these include publishing lies
and doctored photographs threats of rape
and other violence posting sensitive
personal
mation about victims emailing damaging
statements about victims to employers
and manipulating search engines to make
damaging material about the victim more
prominent victims frequently respond by
adopting pseudonyms are going offline
entirely experts attribute the
destructive nature of anonymous online
mobs to group dynamics saying that
groups with homogeneous views tend to
become more extreme as members reinforce
each other's beliefs they fail to see
themselves as individuals and lose a
sense of personal responsibility for
their destructive acts in doing so they
dehumanized their victims becoming more
aggressive when they believe they are
supported by authority figures so this
is what I'm going through right now I
recognize that i have a blog setup and I
have made videos calling people out by
name this is done in self-defense and
for my protection it is also to warn
other people that this is a group of
women who are unstable and dangerous I
believe they have made up many of the
threats they claim to receive but I
can't prove that what I do know and
could prove if need be is that I have
nothing to do with any threats against
any of them I can also say for the
record that this began back in June I
have never done a single thing to any of
these people except what I've done in
self-defense that's all I want to say
tonight thanks for listening
you
